scripts.deploy-prod: yarn build && cd build && aws s3 sync --acl public-read --delete . s3://sergio-casolari/ --profile placedv && cd .. && aws cloudfront create-invalidation --distribution-id E1ACGWPMSJO6CZ --paths "/*" --profile placedv
scripts.deploy-test: yarn build && cd build && aws s3 sync --acl public-read --delete . s3://sergio-casolari-test/ --profile placedv && cd .. && aws cloudfront create-invalidation --distribution-id EOCDJ8C2MDZKW --paths "/*" --profile placedv
